model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Speaker A, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: Did you play any Resident Evil this week?
Speaker B: I sure did. There was a storm nearby and it was raining for the last three days. Perfect weather for staying in my room playing RE. How about you?
Speaker A: I don't like playing scary video games but I did play a little bit. The weather was very stormy here as well, so I decided to stay in and mess around to look for something to play. I like everything but scary games but can't decide on what to play next. Do you have any suggestions?
Speaker B: Unfortunately I mainly play games similar to RE. I don't know why I like them so much. I remember when I was little my brother play Doom and it gave me nightmares for a week. What genre of games you like?

[MEMORY]
Speaker A enjoys playing Jurassic Park: World but mentions its lack of multiplayer and outdated graphics.
Speaker A is hesitant to try playing Resident Evil but enjoys playing Jurassic Park: World.
Speaker A and Speaker B plan to play games together, with Speaker A trying out Resident Evil.

prediction:
Brief explanation: The memory contains information about Speaker A having played and enjoyed the game Jurassic Park: World, despite its lack of multiplayer and outdated graphics. This information could be useful while recommending a game for Speaker A since the Speaker B knows that they doesn't like scary games. Also, the fact that Speaker A has hesitations about Resident Evil is relevant. 
Judgement: "Yes"
